name: Zoho Desk 2023 v3
description:
1. Larger navigation buttons. This style makes the main buttons larger and widens the ticket options panel. The overall effect is to create easier targets for faster navigation. This enhancement is more suited to users with reasonably high resolution screens.
2. Plain black nav bar: With this Style the dusty dark blue color in the navigation panels is replaced with plain black. This is a workaround while waiting for Zoho to offer a theme selector.
